question: Which among the following is correct representation of the Money Multiplier?
option1: Ratio of Broad Money (M3) to Reserved Money (M0) i.e. M3/M0
option2: Ratio of Broad Money (M3) to Narrow Money (M1) i.e. M3/M1
option3: Ratio of Narrow Money (M1) to Broad Money (M3) i.e. M1/M3
option4: Ratio of Narrow Money (M1) to Reserved Money (M0) i.e. M1/M0
answer: Ratio of Broad Money (M3) to Reserved Money (M0) i.e. M3/M0
